channel.title: Pimpscape server development
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome.
Recently my other server development failed terribly, therefore i started a project (on my own), using pimpscape as a base, it has 16 Handlers, including server, graphics handler etc, their is only one character saving folder, client.java is 229KB (this will be continued down to 100kb max).
I am going to package this server, the client has already been created using the 317 deob.
Server Features (soon to be added) { All skills Correct projectiles Minigames Prayer anything a 317 has }
Client features (nearly finished) { Models (100% only skillcapes + hoods) Tabs open with F1, F2, Esc, Etc. added a new frame sorta thingy ( i do not know what to call it ) multi icon skulls }
Here are a few picture for now:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2mchk6v.jpg[/img]
UPDATE LOG:
Suggestions are very much appreciated.
p....s.... this will only be a 317 server no more, no less.

item.title: Pimpscape server development

item.description:
@I_Uk_0wn4g3_I wrote:

Hello, and welcome.

Recently my other server development failed terribly, therefore i started a project (on my own), using pimpscape as a base, it has 16 Handlers, including server, graphics handler etc, their is only one character saving folder, client.java is 229KB (this will be continued down to 100kb max).

I am going to package this server, the client has already been created using the 317 deob.

Server Features (soon to be added)
{
All skills
Correct projectiles

Prayer
anything a 317 has
}

{
Models (100% only skillcapes + hoods)
Tabs open with F1, F2, Esc, Etc.
added a new frame sorta thingy ( i do not know what to call it )
multi icon
skulls

Suggestions are very much appreciated.

p…s… this will only be a 317 server no more, no less.
